item.title: Inquiry into Knowledge of Extradition Plans – U.S. Intelligence and McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2021-06-03_0143_0800_email_question_dinner_2019_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: URGENT: the dinner we had in 2019 Date sent: June 3, 2021, 01:43 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: [Subject #2 (U.S. Intelligence Operative)] Cc: [Subject #3 (U.S. Intelligence Operative)], [REDACTED - My spouse] Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2021-06-03_0143_0800_email_question_dinner_2019_Redacted.pdf Note: This document is being published for the first time on May 10, 2025. Very Important: When I originally sent this email to my American friends, I had no idea they were affiliated with U.
